DOC.brief_summary: This safety study evaluate subject participate previous Organon trial drug Org 24448 . Patients undergo Screening visit , 1 2 Evaluation visit , possible Follow-Up period . During visit , study test , include echocardiogram , perform summarize cardiac functioning .
DOC.brief_title: A Follow Safety Study Patients Who Participated Previous Studies Drug Org 24448 ( Study P05719 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.detailed_description: All subject participate previous Org 24448 trial meet exclusion criterion eligible .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must : verified investigator participate previous Organon sponsor Org 24448 trial . sign affirmative informed consent evaluation conduct ; Subjects must : concurrent acute condition could interfere conduct interpretation evaluation ( e.g . acute psychosis ; respiratory illness ; current experimental medication ) . If possible , evaluation subject defer resolution condition .
